original_text: Then Joab arose and went to Absalom at his house and said to him, “Why have your servants set my field on fire?”
korean_text: 요압이 일어나 압살롬의 집으로 가서 그에게 이르되 어찌하여 네 종들이 내 밭에 불을 질렀느냐 하니

sentences.original_text: and went to Absalom at his house
Why have your servants set my field on fire?
sentences.korean_translation: 어찌하여 당신의 종들이 나의 밭에 불을 놓았습니까?
